text: he meree jaati ke logo! tumhaara raajy hai aaj, tum prabhaavashaalee ho dharatee mein, to kaun hamaaree raksha karega allaah kee yaatana se, yadi vah hamapar aa jaaye? firaun ne kahaah main tum sab ko vahee samajha raha hoon, jise main uchit samajhata hoon aur tumhen seedhee hee raah dikha raha hoon
